details: Performed core IR responsibilities including timely disclosures, shareholder meetings preparation, analyst communications, stock-market monitoring, and equity administration
Supported board operations by preparing board materials and organizing meeting calendars for regular board meetings
Planned and executed IR programs at major industry events including G-STAR 2025
Analyzed market, industry, and investment community research to provide insights to C-level executives
Prepared daily CEO briefings on company stock performance, peer activity, and major global market movements
Prepared periodic & timely disclosures to Korea Exchange (KRX) and Finance Services Commission (FSC) in both Korean and English to ensure compliance and timely market communication
Developed 10+ quarterly earnings materials, including earnings presentations and scripts, translating complex financial and industry data into clear, investor-focused content
Produced 15+ structured market and industry analysis reports to support senior management's strategic decisions
Administered equity-related processes including CB conversions, new share listings, shareholder register maintenance, and corresponding documentation with Korea Exchange (KRX)
Supported IR events such as NDRs, IR Conferences, and Corporate Days through materials preparation, introductory remarks, and meeting summaries
Maintained active communication with analysts by operating a Telegram channel for timely company updates, and handled inquiry calls from individual shareholders
